00105 const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00106 const size_t        digits_in_uintmax =
00107     (std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits + bits_per_digit - 1) /
00108     bits_per_digit;
00109 const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00110 const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00111 const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00112 const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);

00217 class temp_t: public base_integer {
00218     public:
00219     explicit temp_t(const base_integer& b) {
00220         flags = b.flags;
00221         data = b.data;
00222         ++data->copies;
00223     }
00224 
00226     temp_t(const base_integer& b, size_t realloc_size):
00227         base_integer(b._is_fixed()
00228             ? allocate_fixed(b.data->fixed_mask, b._fixed_digits(), realloc_size)
00229             : allocate(realloc_size)) { }

00314 class fixed_integer_any: public detail::base_integer {

00325         base_integer(detail::digits_in_uintmax, detail::digit_mask)
00326         { _set_signed(n); }
00327 
00328     template <typename T> fixed_integer_any(const T& n,
00329         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00330         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type* = 0):

00355 template <class T>
00356 class base_divide_t {
00357     public:

00359     base_divide_t(const T& q, const T& r): quotient(q), remainder(r) { }
00360     base_divide_t(const base_divide_t<T>& copy):
00361         quotient(copy.quotient), remainder(copy.remainder) { }
00362     base_divide_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(base_divide_t) move) {
00363         quotient._swap(move.quotient); remainder._swap(move.remainder); }
00364 
00365     base_divide_t& operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(base_divide_t) copy)
00366         { quotient = copy.quotient; remainder = copy.remainder; return
00367         *this; }
00368     base_divide_t& operator=(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(base_divide_t) move) {
00369         quotient._swap(move.quotient); remainder._swap(move.remainder); return
00370         *this; }

00389 
00390 template <typename T>
00391 size_t log2(const T& n,
00392     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00393     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type* = 0)
00394 {
00395     size_t lo=0, hi=std::numeric_limits<T>::digits;
00396     while (lo < hi) {
00397         size_t s = lo + ((hi - lo) >> 1);
00398         if (n >= (T(1) << s)) lo = s + 1;
00399         else hi = s;
00400     }
00401     return lo;
00402 }
00403 
00404 template <typename T>
00405 size_t log2(const T& nn,
00406     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00407     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type* = 0)
00408 {
00409     typedef typename boost::make_unsigned<T>::type uT;
00410     return log2(static_cast<uT>(nn < 0 ? -nn : nn));
00411 }
00412 
00413 template <typename T>
00414 T to(const base_integer& n) {
00415     if (compare(n, fixed_integer_any((std::numeric_limits<T>::min)())) < 0
00416         || compare(n, fixed_integer_any((std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())) > 0)
00417             throw exceptions::too_big("value out of range for requested "
00418                 "conversion");
00419 
00420     T rval = 0;
00421     size_t len=n._get_length();
00422     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x) {
00423         if (sizeof(T) > sizeof(detail::digit_t)) rval <<= detail::bits_per_digit;
00424         rval += static_cast<T>(n._get_digit(len - x - 1));
00425     }
00426     if (n._get_negative()) rval = -rval; // Bogus MSVC warning C4146
00427     return rval;
00428 }
00429 
00430 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00431 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00432     traits>& out, const base_integer& n)
00433 {
00434     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00435         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00436         : 10);
00437     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00438 
00439     int nsign = (n._is_zero() ? 0 : n._get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00440     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00441 
00442     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00443         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00444 
00445         if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00446         else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00447         else if (base==8) out << "0";
00448 
00449         if (n._get_negative()) {
00450             out << to_string(neg_t(n), base, upperCase);
00451         } else {
00452             out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00453         }
00454     } else {
00455         out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00456     }
00457     return out;
00458 }
00459 
00460 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00461 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00462     traits>& in, base_integer& n)
00463 {
00464     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00465     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00466     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00467     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00468 
00469     size_t base=autobase;
00470     if (count==1) {
00471         if (hex) base=16;
00472         else if (oct) base=8;
00473         else base=10;
00474     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00475     // else auto-base
00476 
00477     std::string s;
00478     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00479         in.ignore();
00480     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00481         in.ignore();
00482         s.push_back('-');
00483     }
00484 
00485     if (base==autobase) {
00486         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00487             in.ignore();
00488             int c=in.peek();
00489             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00490                 in.ignore();
00491                 base=16;
00492             } else base=8;
00493         } else base=10;
00494     }
00495 
00496     while (in) {
00497         int c=in.peek();
00498         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00499             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00500             (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00501                 (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00502         {
00503             in.ignore();
00504             s.push_back(char(c));
00505         } else break;
00506     }
00507 
00508     try {
00509         detail::from_string(n, s, base);
00510     } catch (std::exception&) {
00511         // Catch invalid strings
00512         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00513     }
00514 
00515     return in;
00516 }
00517
